post_stage1.text: HAHA! I'm free, im free! Free from that wretched box of a cell! But this place still reeks of confinement.
Though... I'm not exactly free, I'm still in this hellish pit hole of a prison. The walls seem to mock me with their permanence.
I could easily escape however, but... I'm craving chaos. I'll stir up some trouble before I make my grand exit.
(Mizuchi steps out of her cell, the cell that had kept her in for what must have been forever.)
Ahh, fresh air! It's invigorating after that suffocating cell.
Not finished, however. People can still recognize me, and I'll be back in that box again. I need a disguise, a new face.
Mizuchi: I could possess someone, but who though? Someone unsuspecting and easily manipulated.
There's my little puppet~ My ticket out of hell.
(Look at that spirit waltzing by with such rage in her eyes.)
(It fills me with a certain kind of rage within myself that I can never be filled with such ire...)
(A Hashihime, huh? I've seen a fair deal of repulsive youkai last time I was out.)
(But none perplex me like a Hashihime...)
Hey! Spirits like you aren't supposed to be heading out like that!
You know, I feel suddenly compelled to take over your body.
Take over my what? Well, maybe I would finally have your anger, your vengeance that I am vying for.
And I would get to have your body!
Maybe we could, strike a deal, you know?
A deal, huh? My body for your anger...
Wait, but that would mean I would be envious about other people with a body.
Tch... Hashihimes... never ever pleased, always wanting to have a cake and eat it too.
And vengeful spirits like you, filled with a never-ending amount of anger.
Maybe you and I aren't that different after all.
That's why we two should be in one body once I take it over!

post_stage2.text: Ahh. We really are one and the same figuratively and now literally, huh?
Now to look for a way out.
Darn, this ascent looks like it will never end.
Being this tired after the fight, I don't think I can make it out through that.
How about this river instead? Build a raft, drift away, and hope I end somewhere I want to be.

post_stage3.text:
The walls are now cleared. 
...who's that in the distance?
You're not supposed to break out of this prison, Mizuchi.
Not like this prison can hold me in anyway.
Oh really? I'd like to see you try.
